title: Silver Dream
description: Joanna suspects that her neighbour, old Mr. Thomas, is stealing horses. Only his granddaughter knows the truth and she is protecting him at all costs, costs which may include the lives of the stolen horses and the young man who has gone missing. When Joanna investigates further, she discovers a decades-old crime â€“ and finds the person who is still very motivated to keep everything concealed.
author: Angela Dorsey
